response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional opportunity tailored to meet your needs and expectations. Given its value to us, we're offering it to you at a special price of $12,000. This represents a significant savings compared to the market value, making it a great deal for you. We believe this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
